function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited data duration (less than four months) in the selected studies","Impact":"Risk of insufficient understanding of the long-term effects of temperature and humidity on virus spread","Mitigation":"Include longer-term data in studies to better assess the impact of temperature and humidity","Technologies":"Data collection technologies for long-term observation","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Non-peer-reviewed manuscripts included in the analysis","Impact":"Risk of misleading or inaccurate conclusions due to lack of peer review","Mitigation":"Exercise caution when considering non-peer-reviewed findings, seek additional validation from peer-reviewed sources","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, validation algorithms for study results","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Failure to consider migration patterns and isolation policies in the studies","Impact":"Limited understanding of factors directly impacting the spread rate of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Include migration patterns and isolation policies as variables in future studies to improve accuracy","Technologies":"Data analytics, geographical tracking technologies","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
